pageContext.description: Dimensions: max. dim. 74.7mm; max T 5.1; min. T 2.5; Wt. 33.0 g,Typology: both faces undulating,Manufacture: mostly in as-cast condition; possible signs of flattening of bumps around the notch, also short striations nearby - origin?,Condition: very slight bowing down length as well as slight twisting of plate and little curved in cross-section; three sides broken edges - fourth possibly so; irreg. but more bulbous; crack on one face does not penetrate to rev. - from stress in bending?,Attached Material: ? quartz grain - c. 2.5mm - caught in fissure close to one edge, possibly beaten in; white and green granular accretion in patches and in broken surfaces.
pageContext.collection: Gibson, Mr. D. J. - private (9),115 Hurstcourt Rd., Sutton, Surrey
pageContext.remarks: PIF; AFI; DF(S); SI; CI; Rec: SN Dec. 79; Source: Sb. A.; Sub. Inf.: Sc. via Jon Cotton (W. London F.U.) March 79
